title: About to get 1000th ARAM win!  Would any Rioters care to join in for it?
body:
Hi, Riot,

I've had a really great time playing your game over the years, and I became an ARAM fan after the first game I played in the mode.  I'm on 999 wins in ARAM, and I'm wondering, would any Rioters care to accompany me for win 1000?  Please feel free to add me in-game, I'm on now :)

Best regards,

--- Stüdmuffin

replies.body: Your on the OCE boards, not the NA ones.
